marklogic.body: apart from the restriction of free movement ( although she would probably end up in one of the open prisons for friends of tds ) she would probablybe better under our system . free Heating ,freemeals, free tv,quicker access to hospital should she become ill. theres a lot of people out there who would be Glad of such a nursing home. so the prison system alreasdy does what she thinks it does. they cannot even keep drugs out of the system which should be a no brainer. no contact food parcels ,presents at any visits end of and mandatory 20 years for warders bringing them in.
